text: Columbella adansoni is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== E' presente in areale relittuale disgiunto nelle coste centro africane e lungo le Azzorre. ==References== Category:Columbellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1853
title: Columbella adansoni
